name: Chuy
description: Northern region with the capital Bishkek, known for historic sites and mountain valleys.

places.name: Burana Tower
places.description: An 11th-century minaret near Tokmok; one of the oldest structures in Central Asia.

places.name: Ala-Archa Gorge
places.description: Alpine national park offering hiking trails, waterfalls and glaciers.

places.name: Chon-Kemin National Park
places.description: Scenic valley with forests, rivers and horseback-riding opportunities.

places.name: Suusamyr Valley
places.description: High-altitude valley famous for its summer pastures and wildflowers.

name: Issyk-Kul
description: Eastern region dominated by Issyk-Kul Lake and dramatic mountain ranges.

places.name: Issyk-Kul Lake
places.description: Gigantic alpine lake that never freezes, called the 'Pearl of Kyrgyzstan'

places.name: Jety-Oguz Gorge
places.description: Red sandstone cliffs nicknamed the 'Seven Bulls' and therapeutic hot springs

places.name: Fairy Tale Canyon (Skazka)
places.description: Colorful canyon with wind-carved formations resembling castles and creatures

places.name: Altyn-Arashan
places.description: High valley with natural hot springs and alpine meadows accessible via Karakol

places.name: Ala-Kul Lake
places.description: Turquoise glacial lake reached by a challenging trek from Karakol

places.name: Barskoon Waterfall
places.description: Dramatic waterfalls on the southern shore; gateway to high passes

name: Talas
description: North-western region famous for Kyrgyz epic heritage and rural charm.

places.name: Manas Mausoleum (Manas Kumbez)
places.description: Memorial complex dedicated to the legendary hero Manas

places.name: Sheker (Aitmatov Museum)
places.description: Village where writer Chyngyz Aitmatov was born; houses a museum in his honour

places.name: Besh-Tash National Park
places.description: Mountain park with lakes, forests and nomad settlements.

places.name: Talassky Valley
places.description: Scenic valley known for horse pastures and traditional lifestyle.

name: Naryn
description: Central mountainous region with high plateaus and nomadic heritage.

places.name: Song-Kol Lake
places.description: High-mountain lake where travellers can stay in yurts and experience nomadic life

places.name: Tash-Rabat Caravanserai
places.description: 15th-century stone caravanserai on the Silk Road near the Chinese border

places.name: Kel-Suu Lake
places.description: Remote glacial lake surrounded by sheer cliffs; requires off-road travel and border permit

places.name: Naryn City
places.description: Administrative centre perched along a deep gorge; gateway to Eki-Naryn and At-Bashi valleys.

name: Jalal-Abad
description: South-western region with lush forests, reservoirs and cultural diversity.

places.name: Sary-Chelek Biosphere Reserve
places.description: UNESCO-listed reserve with an alpine lake surrounded by dense forests

places.name: Toktogul Reservoir
places.description: Largest reservoir in Kyrgyzstan and Central Asia

places.name: Arslanbob Walnut Forest
places.description: World's largest natural walnut forest and the birthplace of the walnut

places.name: Jalal-Abad City
places.description: Regional capital known for mineral springs and traditional bazaars.

name: Osh
description: Southern region nicknamed the 'second capital' with ancient history and stunning peaks.

places.name: Sulaiman-Too Mountain
places.description: UNESCO-listed sacred mountain rising above Osh city

places.name: Uzgen Minaret & Mausoleums
places.description: Ancient complex from the Karakhanid dynasty with ornate brickwork.

places.name: Lenin Peak
places.description: One of Kyrgyzstan's highest peaks located in the Pamir Alai range

places.name: Alai Valley
places.description: High valley connecting Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan, offering views of the Pamir Mountains

places.name: Tulpar-Kol Lake
places.description: Picturesque alpine lake near the base camp for climbing Lenin Peak

name: Batken
description: Remote south-western region known for its rugged terrain and endemic flowers.

places.name: Aigul-Tash Mountain
places.description: Mountain where the rare Aigul flower blooms

places.name: Karavshan Gorge
places.description: High-cliffed gorge popular with climbers and trekkers

places.name: Ai-Kul Lake
places.description: Mountain lake with crystal-clear water

places.name: Kahn Fortress
places.description: Historic fortress ruins perched on a hill
